medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset abdominal pain and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed sudden onset epigastric abdominal pain radiating to her back after eating a sandwich this afternoon. The pain was colicky and dull in nature. She experienced vomiting associated with the pain and confirmed a fever of 102.2 at home. Symptoms progressed over the past day.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Acute myelofibrosis with panmyelosis, treated with decitabine; presented with pancytopenia and a history of bacteremia due to coagulase negative staph.
medical_history.family_history: Daughter is s/p lumpectomy (?breast cancer) ___ years ago. Father died from bone cancer; brother also died from bone cancer.
